Gabriel Cornish

About Archive Portfolio

Portfolio

TWIST - STORIES YOU STAR IN

This was the first game I helped develop from pre-production all the way through launch. It’s a narrative game with deep customization and where your choices affect the story.

The team was absolutely fantastic. They were among the most talented people I’ve had the honor to work with. Definitely one of the greatest, most fun experiences I have had developing video games.

HARRY POTTER HOGWARTS MYSTERY

I had the pleasure of doing some Systems Design work on Harry Potter Hogwarts Mystery right before its release. I was brought in close to launch to help redesign parts of the core loop and the overhaul of the classroom gameplay.

PANDA POP

Man did I love working on this game. I was a Level and Feature Designer. I got to work on a couple live event features while also creating over 150 levels. It was a blast to be a part of this project at the height of its popularity.

AL- A Choose Your Own Adventure

Shoot Stuff

A small arcade game you can finish in a single sitting. Created using Pico8.
